Fields.name: AnonReport
Fields.desc: Shows usernames instead of pseudo anonymised names in reports.

Fields.name: AuditLog
Fields.desc: Enables the Unified Audit Log for tracking and auditing activities.

Fields.name: DelegateSentItems
Fields.desc: Sets emails sent as and on behalf of shared mailboxes to also be stored in the shared mailbox sent items folder

Fields.name: DisableBasicAuthSMTP
Fields.desc: Disables SMTP AUTH for the organization and all users.

Fields.name: DisableGuestDirectory
Fields.desc: Disables Guest access to enumerate directory objects. This prevents guest users from seeing other users or guests in the directory.

Fields.name: DisableReshare
Fields.desc: Disables the ability for external users to share files they don't own.

Fields.name: DisableSecurityGroupUsers
Fields.desc: Completely disables the creation of security groups by users.

Fields.name: DisableSharedMailboxLogon
Fields.desc: Blocks login for all accounts that are marked as a shared mailbox.

Fields.name: DisableTenantCreation
Fields.desc: Restricts creation of M365 tenants to the Global Administrator or Tenant Creator roles.

Fields.name: EnableAppConsentAdminRequests
Fields.desc: Enables App consent admin requests for the tenant via the GA role.

Fields.name: laps
Fields.desc: Enables the tenant to use LAPS

Fields.name: DisableRegistrationCampaign
Fields.desc: Sets the state of the registration campaign for the tenant

Fields.name: DisableAppConsent
Fields.desc: Disables users from being able to consent to applications

Fields.name: PasswordExpireDisabled
Fields.desc: Disables the expiration of passwords for the tenant by setting the password expiration policy to never expire for any user.

Fields.name: SecurityDefaults
Fields.desc: Enables security defaults for the tenant, for newer tenants this is enabled by default.

Fields.name: sharingCapability
Fields.desc: Sets the default sharing level for OneDrive and Sharepoint.
